items.name: Aeroponic Crop Plot
items.description: The Aeroponic Crop Plot is a farming plot for growingSeedsthat can later be harvested forPlant Resourcesonce fully grown. Unless the Prospector has theFresh Is Besttalent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grownPlant Resourcewill eventually wither if not harvested.

items.name: Aluminium Ore
items.description: Aluminium Ore is a mid-gameMineralResource. Prospectors can first utilize aluminium once they reach level 20 and unlockTier 3, when it can be crafted into upgradedWeaponslike theRecurve BowandAluminium Arrow. It is widely used in constructs (for example,Aluminium BeamandAluminium Door), and in the late-game it is a vital component ofItemslikeComposite Chest Armor.

items.name: Arctic Explorer Saddle
items.description: The Arctic Explorer Saddle is a saddle forMountsthat has an artic theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Arctic Pelt
items.description: Arctic Pelts are a harvestedResourceused to craftArctic Armor, a significant upgrade overFur Armorfor prospectors adventuring in the ArcticBiomes.
items.crafted_at: Crafted atTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted atTextiles BenchAdvanced Textiles BenchElectric Textiles Bench

items.name: Art Deco Candlestick
items.description: The Art Deco Candlestick is an gilded item of significant worth. It can be built with either beeswax or animal fat and takes either as fuel inputs.

items.name: Bearhide Saddle
items.description: The Bearhide Saddle is a saddle forMountsthat has a bear theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to theBasic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Beeswax Wood Halfpieces
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked inTier 2of theTech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlierWoodversions with the inclusion ofBeeswax

items.name: Beeswax Wood Halfpitches
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked inTier 2of theTech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlierWoodversions with the inclusion ofBeeswax

items.name: Biofuel Extractor
items.description: This device is used to extractExoticsfrom Exotic Deposits. Does not require electricity, but uses biofuel instead. The Biofuel Extractor runs 33% slower than theElectric Extractor, but can be crafted earlier in theTech Tree.

items.name: Biomore Backpack
items.description: The Biomore Backpack provides six inventory slots, along with 3 active auras where the prospector and nearby allies having increased physical resistance, quicker healing from bacterial, parasitic and poison modifiers, and additional health regeneration. It also has offers buffs for the wearer, reducing the stamina impact from using tools, and providing more health to downed prospectors when revived. An excellent choice for prospectors specializing in rescues.

items.name: Bone
items.description: Bone is aAnimal Resourceobtained fromFauna. It is also sometimes found when harvesting fish.

items.name: Bone Javelin
items.description: The Bone Javelin is a variant of theBone Spearthat can only be thrown and is an upgrade to theWood Javelin. Despite it requiring more materials to craft, the increase in damage can mean the difference between winning and losing a fight against Icarus' fauna.

items.name: Bone Lure
items.description: The Bone Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Bone Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Bone Shield
items.description: The Bone Shield is crafted at the Character Crafting menu with the following resources:

items.name: Bone Sickle
items.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs,Reed Flower,Wheat, etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

items.name: Bramble Bush
items.description: Bramble Bush is produced by harvesting the cultivated variety ofBramble. Bramble can be grown withSeedseither harvested from wild, extracted with theSeed Extractoror using aBramble Farming Packetfrom theWorkshop.
harvested_from: extracted with the Seed Extractor or using a Bramble Farming Packet from the Workshop

items.name: Brutalist Candlestick
items.description: The Brutalist Candlestick is mode from concrete and either animal fat or beeswax. There are two varieties by selecting R. Fuel is either beeswax or animal fat.

items.name: Calf
items.description: A Calf is an imported domesticatedFaunathat is brought down to the planet and raised to maturity primarily to produceMilk.

items.name: Carbon Fiber
items.description: While being aTier 3component, Carbon Fiber is only used to makeCarbon Arrows, theCarbon Spear/Javelin, and theCarbon Fibre Round Shieldin the Tier 3 Tech Tree; however, it is a critical component widely used inTier 4crafting.

items.name: Carrot
items.description: Carrots are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenishHunger.

items.name: Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch
items.description: The Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch
items.description: The Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Bookshelf
items.description: The Carved Wood Bookshelf is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Cabinet
items.description: The Carved Wood Cabinet is a decorative piece with 10 item slots.

items.name: Carved Wood Candlestick
items.description: The Carved Wood Candlestick can be crafted using either beeswax or animal fat and will take either as fuel. There are three varieties that can be selected using the 'R' key while deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Desk Lamp
items.description: The Carved Wood Desk Lamp is a decorative item that requires 150 kwh of electricity

items.name: Carved Wood Dresser
items.description: The Carved Wood Dresser is a decorative item with 10 inventory slots.

items.name: Carved Wood Nightstand
items.description: The Carved Wood Nightstand is a decorative nightstand with 10 inventory slots. It has five build variants available by using the 'R' key when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Stool
items.description: The Carved Wood Stool is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Wardrobe
items.description: The Carved Wood Wardrobe is a decorative wardrobe with 10 inventory slots. It has two build variants available by selecting 'R' when deploying.

items.name: Chicken
items.description: A Chicken is aTransplantedfarm animal that provides a source ofEggsandRaw ChickenforFoodrecipes.

items.name: Coal Ore
items.description: Coal Ore is aMineralfound on Icarus in the open and caves. It's most basic use is as a fuel in aCampfireorStone Furnace, though this is somewhat inefficient as it is more valuable as component for crafting.

items.name: Cocoa Seed
items.description: Cocoa Seed are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus.

items.name: Coconut Farming Packet
items.description: The Coconut Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationor theOrbital Exchange Interfaceand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five seeds that can be planted inDirt MoundsorCrop Plots.

items.name: Coffee Bean
items.description: Coffee Bean are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus.

items.name: Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone
items.description: Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cold Steel Sickle
items.description: Cold Steel Sickle is aTier 3Sicklemade withCold Steel Ingotsintroduced onPrometheus. Due to the materials required, crafting the item requires the New Frontiers DLC.

items.name: Copper Ore
items.description: Copper Ore is an early-gameMineralResource. It is widely used in the construction ofInterior Wood Building Pieces, and prospectors can make extensive use of copper once they reach level 20 and unlockTier 3, as it is a crucial component inElectronics. In the late game, copper is used in various deployables like theRefrigeratorand theMaterial Processor.

items.name: Corn
items.description: Corn are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenishHunger.

items.name: Cow
items.description: A Cow is the mature version of aCalfthat can be purchased and brought down to the planet primarily to produceMilk.

items.name: Crushed Bone
items.description: Useful alternate resource for makingEpoxy.

items.name: Cryogenically Frozen Calf
items.description: The Cryogenically Frozen Calf is a deployable container containing aCalfthat can be researched and obtained in theWorkshopand called down to the planet using theOrbital Exchange Interface.

items.name: Cryogenically Frozen Chicken
items.description: The Cryogenically Frozen Chicken is a deployable container containing aChickenthat can be researched and obtained in theWorkshopand called down to the planet using theOrbital Exchange Interface.

items.name: Dried Fatty T-Bone
items.description: Dried Fatty T-Bone is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Exotics
items.description: Exotics are one the most valuableMineralharvested on Icarus and are a potential reward for completing certainMissions/Operations. They were the reason terraforming failed on Icarus, and now their unique properties are sought after by the variousFactionsseeking to exploit Icarus.
harvested_from: any mission except Potshot: Training; the yield per vein
where they are located vary per mission

items.name: Fiber
items.description: In-game description:A bundle of soft fiber, highly useful.

items.name: Fiber Farming Packet
items.description: The Fiber Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Fiber seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

items.name: Fiber Lure
items.description: The Fiber Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Fiber Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Frozen Ore
items.description: Frozen Ore is a resource produced as a by-product of mining a mineral node with aPickaxethat has a chance to produce frozen ore, such as theCold Steel PickaxeorInaris "Viridian" Pickaxe.

items.name: Fur
items.description: Fur is widely used when craftingArmors, and in certainDeployableslike theBedroll. It is a crucial ingredient inFur Armor, which is essential equipment for prospectors venturing into theArcticBiomefor the first time.

items.name: Gold Ore
items.description: Gold Ore is aMineralResource. Prospectors can make extensive use of Gold Ore once they reach level 20 and unlockTier 3, as it is a crucial component inElectronics.

items.name: Gold Ore Lure
items.description: The Gold Ore Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Gold Ore Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Gorse Flower
items.description: Gorse Flower are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus.

items.name: Hydroponic Crop Plot
items.description: The Hydroponic Crop Plot is a farming plot for growingSeedsthat can later be harvested forPlant Resourcesonce fully grown. Unless the Prospector has theFresh Is Besttalent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grownPlant Resourcewill eventually wither if not harvested.

items.name: Ice Borer
items.description: The Ice Borer will drill super-cooled ice deposits when supplied with biofuel from aBiofuel Can/MXC Fuel Canister. Super-cooled ice deposits can only be found on frozen lakes and rivers in the Arctic regions of Prometheus (Biomes: Glacial Cascade or Alpine Steppe - a map of Prometheus biomes can be foundhere.). The Ice Borer has 5 slots and will last 2 hours and 5 minutes on a fullBiofuel Can.

items.name: Industrial Candlestick
items.description: The Industrial Candlestick is a decorative item from the Industrial Furniture Pack DLC.

items.name: Interior Wood Cupboard
items.description: A Interior Wood Cupboard made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to theWood Cupboard.

items.name: Interior Wood Halfpieces
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Halfpitches
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Ladder
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Railing
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Railing
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Railing Gate
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Iron Crop Plot
items.description: The Iron Crop Plot is a farming plot for growingSeedsthat can later be harvested forPlant Resourcesonce fully grown. Unless the Prospector has theFresh Is Besttalent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grownPlant Resourcewill eventually wither if not harvested.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: Iron Ore is aMineral, that allows prospectors to createTier 2/Tier 3ToolsandWeaponswith both theAnvil BenchandMachining Bench. In addition, iron is widely used inSteel Ingotfor craftingItemssuch as theSteel Pickaxe, and Late-game Deployables like theFabricator/Electric Furnace.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: Iron Ore is aMineral, that allows prospectors to createTier 2/Tier 3ToolsandWeaponswith both theAnvil BenchandMachining Bench. In addition, iron is widely used inSteel Ingotfor craftingItemssuch as theSteel Pickaxe, and Late-game Deployables like theFabricator/Electric Furnace.

items.name: Leather
items.description: Leather is a crucial component of many recipes in Icarus. Having a good stockpile of leather is something every prospector strive for.

items.name: Legendary Biomass
items.description: Legendary Biomass is an in-game currency used to craft attachments to upgradeLegendary Weaponsat theBio-labin orbit.

items.name: Lily
items.description: A small flower which grows in groups in theForestBiomeon Icarus. They can be harvested most efficiently with the use ofSickles.

items.name: Mature Coconut
items.description: If a prospector lets aRipe Coconutdecay, it will ripen into a mature coconut.

items.name: Medium Interior Wood Crate
items.description: A Medium Interior Wood Crate made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to theMedium Wood Crate.

items.name: Medium Wood Crate
items.description: Larger than theSmall Wood Crate, the Medium Wood Crate also possesses an increased inventory space with 20 slots. Like most otherDeployables, this must be underShelteror it will be destroyed when exposed toWeatherevents. It is possible to loot the contents if this crate is destroyed, but only for a limited time.

items.name: Medium Wood Hedgehog
items.description: The Medium Wood Hedgehog are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment.

items.name: Miasmic Javelin
items.description:
The Miasmic Javelin is a variant of theMiasmic Spearthat can only be thrown. Deals poison damage on hit and has a 15% chance to apply a unique debuff to targets while dealing periodic poison damage. Excels when used against Fauna that have a weakness to poison. A list of Fauna that are weak to poison can be viewedhere. When the Miasma modifier does proc, periodic poison damage is dealt to the target over the span of 10 seconds.
Fauna with:

items.name: Miasmic Sickle
items.description: Miasmic Sickle is aTier 4Sicklemade withDistilled Miasmic Coatingderived fromCrystallized Miasmafound in theSwampsonPrometheus. Due to the materials required, crafting the item requires the New Frontiers DLC.

items.name: Milk
items.description: Milk is a late-game resource obtained from matureCowsraised from juvenileCalvespurchased from the orbitalWorkshop. Calves must be raised to adulthood using similar mechanics to tamingMountsincluding feeding, watering and providing a bed for the animal to sleep on.

items.name: Mining Armature
items.description: The Mining Armature is an electro-mechanical gauntlet that serves as aPickaxefor mining or for use in melee combat where it can inflict considerable damage to armored targets. It can be purchased in theBio-laband upgraded with various attachments.
items.crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Workshop Repair Kitat a poweredRepair Bench

items.name: Mushroom
items.description: Mushrooms can only be harvested in caves in theArcticbiomes, and are harvested by hand. Caves with Mushrooms are almost exclusively caves with pit traps, this can make them easier to find on interactive maps. Also theMushroom Farming Packetcan be purchased in theWorkshop. Consuming this item will yield 5 Mushrooms.

items.name: NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade
items.description: The NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade is an upgrade for theCONT4CT Devicedeployed in anOpen Worldmap that visually upgrades the screens and provides a Bosses tab that provides information on the currently active world bosses.

items.name: Noxious Logging Inhaler
items.description: The Noxious Logging Inhaler is aMedicinethat allowsInfected Barkto be harvested when chopping trees and also boosts felling damage and resistance to collision damage from falling trees.

items.name: Noxious Mining Inhaler
items.description: The Noxious Mining Inhaler is aMedicinewhose effects allowNoxious Crustto be harvested when mining and add a small boost to mining yield and radius.

items.name: Platinum Ore
items.description: Platinum Ore is a mid-gameMineralResource, and can be utilized by prospectors after they reach level 20 and unlockTier 3in theTech Tree. Platinum is required for a number of upgradedToolsandWeapons, including thePlatinum SpearandPlatinum Sickle.

items.name: Platinum Weave
items.description: Platinum Weave is aTier 3crafted resource used for various items including armor, animal items, rugs, fishing lures and furniture.
items.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Textiles Bench Electric Textiles Bench

items.name: Poison Sack
items.description: Poison Sacks are a resource that drops fromCaveworms. Only after completingUnearthed: Researchcan these sacks andCaveworm Scalesbe used to craft new weaponry at aCrafting Bench.
harvested_from:
le with care



Harvesting Information

Source
Caveworms


Location
Caves



Misc Info




Weight
Stack Size




1

items.name: Potato
items.description: A plant which grows in theSwampandTundraBiomeson Prometheus. They can be harvested most efficiently with the use ofSickles.

items.name: Prototype Thumper
items.description: The more ore available, the bigger the impact on the surrounding environment, so expect more opposition when taking on lucrative deposits in densely populated areas.

items.name: Pumpkin
items.description: Pumpkin are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenishHunger.

items.name: Reed Flower
items.description: Reed flowers can be found alongside water in theForestBiomeon Icarus. They can be harvested most efficiently with aSickle.

items.name: Resources
items.description: Prospectors face a host of challenges when they drop onto Icarus. They must maintain an adequate supply ofOxygen,WaterandFood, craftShelterfrom the planets storms, and survive encounters with theFauna. Prospectors will need to rely on a wide range of resources: some they will find in the wild, and others they will make themselves. How prospectors master the use of these resources will determine their overall success during their limited time on Icarus.

items.name: Sandworm
items.description: A monstrous beast that lives beneath the sand on Olympus and Styx.

items.name: Sandworm Scale
items.description: Harvested fromSandworms, attacking the body of aSandwormwill break off scales which fall to the ground. However, be quick about retrieval as these scales are lost to the dunes quickly.
harvested_from: attacking the body of a S
worm will break off scales which fall to the ground

items.name: Scorpion Carapace
items.description: Scorpion Carapace is required forScorpion Armor, a set with one of the highest physical resistances in the game. Must completeHusk: Exterminationto unlock the recipe for this resource to be useful.

items.name: Seeds
items.description: Seeds are a resource harvested fromFloraor produced in aSeed Extractorthat can be planted inDirt MoundsorCrop Plotsto produce more of that specific crop.
harvested_from: Flora or produced in a Seed Extractor that can be planted in Dirt Mounds or Crop Plots to produce more of that specific crop

items.name: Sheep
items.description: A sheep preserved in cryogenic stasis that can be deployed and defrosted on a planet.

items.name: Silica Ore
items.description: Silica Ore is aMineralfound on the surface of Icarus. Prospectors are likely to first use silica to create theMortar and Pestle. However, it is also the key in making glass and concrete.

items.name: Sinotai Dropship Recall Beacon
items.description: The Sinotai Dropship Recall Beacon will fire a flare that calls the Prospectors dropship to that location when thrown, which can either be used for immediate extraction or left there for use later on. Multiple Recall Beacons can be used per session, however, these are one-use items, so use them carefully. Items stored in the dropships inventory will not be lost when the dropship is called, allowing Prospectors to transport equipment/resources over large distances.

items.name: Small Interior Wood Crate
items.description: A Small Interior Wood Crate made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to theSmall Wood Crate.

items.name: Small Stone Sign
items.description: The Small Stone Sign is a deployable sign post available as a wall sign, floor sign or a small angled variant.
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtMasonry BenchAdvanced Masonry BenchElectric Masonry Bench

items.name: Small Tree
items.description: A small, immature tree, most often growing in wooded areas of theForestBiomeon Icarus. Can be harvested by hand forSticksandFiber, but more efficiently with anAxe.

items.name: Small Wood Crate
items.description: The Small Wood Crate is the first available storage container that can be made by the prospector. While limited in inventory space, anything here will not be lost upon the death of the prospector or count against inventory weight. Like most otherDeployables, this must be underShelteror it will be destroyed when exposed toWeatherevents. It is possible to loot the contents if this crate is destroyed, but only for a limited time.

items.name: Small Wood Sign
items.description: A Small Wood Sign made ofRefined WoodandCopper Nails.

items.name: Soy Bean
items.description: Soy Beans are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus.

items.name: Sponge
items.description: Sponges are found growing in bodies of water on Icarus and are gathered by hand. Sponges are also be obtained through the use ofWater WheelsandBasic Fishing Traps/Advanced Fishing Traps. Sponges can be identified with this reference image:

items.name: Squash
items.description: Squash are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theDesertlocationson Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenishHunger.

items.name: Stick
items.description: Sticks are harvested by picking them up off of the ground, or when harvesting small trees and saplings. Sticks can also be crafted from wood at theCarpentry Bench, or in theCharacter Craftingmenu if you have theWood Breakdowntalent (and its matching Blueprint in Tier 1).

items.name: Stone
items.description: Stone is one of the most abundantMineralsavailable on Icarus. Prospectors will make extensive use of stone from the moment they exit their drop-pods, as it is widely used in the early game for bothToolsandWeapons.

items.name: Stone Brick
items.description: Stone Bricks are a refined resource primarily used to craftStone Brick Building Piecesat anAdvanced Masonry Bench/Electric Masonry Bench.
items.crafted_at: Advanced Masonry Bench Electric Masonry Bench

base_recipe.crafted_at: Advanced Masonry Bench Electric Masonry Bench

items.name: Stone Brick Halfpieces
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Brick Halfpitches
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Buffalo Statue
items.description: The Stone Buffalo Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Cairn
items.description: Stone Cairns are a deployable item can be used as waystones to mark a path across the landscape or to mark areas of significance. Stone Cairns also have one inventory slot that can be used to store deceased pets, marking their grave and providing them a small memorial. When inspecting the Stone Cairn by pressing F, the name and description can be changed as needed.

items.name: Stone Caveworm Statue
items.description: The Stone Caveworm Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Deer Statue
items.description: The Stone Deer Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Elephant Statue
items.description: The Stone Elephant Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Frame
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.
items.crafted_at: the Masonry Bench with the following resources:

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Masonry Bench with the following resources:

items.name: Stone Halfpieces
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.
items.crafted_at: the Masonry Bench with the following resources:

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Masonry Bench with the following resources:

items.name: Stone Halfpitches
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.
items.crafted_at: the Masonry Bench with the following resources:

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Masonry Bench with the following resources:

items.name: Stone Komodo Statue
items.description: The Stone Komodo Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Pile
items.description: The Stone Pile, alongside theWood Pile, are makeshift storage options for large quantities of each raw material. The Stone Pile is immune to ALLWeatherdamage and can be used as a durable barrier toFauna, especially against Fauna like theGrizzly Bear. If placed with just a narrow opening between piles, Bears have an incredibly difficult time getting through which allows the Prospector to melee attack just beyond the bear's attack range.

items.name: Stone Piranha Statue
items.description: The Stone Piranha Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Rabbit Statue
items.description: The Stone Rabbit Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Water Trough
items.description: The Stone Water Trough is a decorative upgrade to theWater Troughthat allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected toWaterusing aWater Pipe Tool, similar to theLarge Water Trough. The Stone Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network likeWater BarrelsorMetal Rain Reservoirs.

items.name: Stonejaw Trophy
items.description: Stonejaw Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete theBestiary, it can also be used in tandem with otherFurnitureto increase theCozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of theWell Rested Buff.

items.name: Tea
items.description: Tea are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus.

items.name: Threshing Attachment
items.description: Threshing Attachment is a mid game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

items.name: Titanium Ore
items.description: Titanium Ore is a late-game Mineral, and can be utilized by prospectors after they reach level 30 and unlock theFabricatorin theTier 4Tech Tree. Titanium  represents the current pinnacle of material strength forToolsand for severalWeapons.

items.name: Tomato
items.description: Tomato are a fruit found growing on bushes in theGrasslandBiomeon Icarus. They can be harvested by hand or more efficiently with the use of aSickle.
harvested_from: area or grown in Crop Plots or Dirt Mounds by planting Seeds obtained by harvesting or from purchasing a Tomato Farming Packet

items.name: Vapor Condenser
items.description: The Vapor Condenser is a deployable that can be placed onEnzyme Geysersto extractCondensed EnzymesandExotics(depending on the game mode).

items.name: Volatile Exotic Seed
items.description: Volatile Exotic Seeds are a resource obtained fromStrange Plantsthat can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop Plots to produce moreVolatile Raw Exotics.

items.name: Water Borer
items.description: The Water Borer is a device that can be placed onEnzyme Geysersand when powered, can be used to extractWaterwhich can be fed into a water network.

items.name: Watermelon
items.description: Watermelons are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus. When consumed by Prospectors, they replenishHungerandThirst.

items.name: Wheat
items.description: A tall grass which grows in clusters in theForestBiomeon Icarus. They can be harvested most efficiently with the use ofSickles. Can be processed intoflourusing theMortar and Pestle.

items.name: Wood
items.description: Wood is a basic crafting ingredient obtained from Trees using an axe or harvested by hand in theDesertvia Cacti. Wood can also be used as a Fuel source forCampfire,Fireplace, andStone Furnace.

items.name: Wood Buffalo Statue
items.description: The Wood Buffalo Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Burner
items.description: The Wood Burner is a source of heat and basic cooking similar to aCampfireorFireplace. It provides the Warming Fire effect (heat and +100% Perceived Threat) allowing a Prospector to sleep nearby. Once fuel is added, it can be activated and will consume fuel regardless of any selected recipe.

items.name: Wood Composter
items.description: Wood Composter increases the rate at which food spoils, and will turnSpoiled PlantsorGuanointoBasic Fertilizer.

items.name: Wood Crop Plot
items.description: The Wood Crop Plot is a farming plot for growingSeedsthat can later be harvested forPlant Resourcesonce fully grown. Unless the Prospector has theFresh Is Besttalent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grownPlant Resourcewill eventually wither if not harvested.

items.name: Wood Cupboard
items.description: Taking up the same floor-space but with a much larger inventory, this is a great upgrade from theMedium Wood Crate.
items.crafted_at: Crafted AtCrafting BenchCarpentry BenchElectric Carpentry BenchMachining BenchFabricator

base_recipe.crafted_at: Crafted AtCrafting BenchCarpentry BenchElectric Carpentry BenchMachining BenchFabricator

items.name: Wood Deer Statue
items.description: The Wood Deer Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Gate Fortification
items.description: The Wood Gate Fortification serves as an entrance when usingWood Wall Fortifications. Similar toMedium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Gate Fortification does not take damage during storms.Wood Spikes Fortificationcannot be mounted to the Wood Gate Fortification.

items.name: Wood Halfpieces
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood roofs or walls require a floor or wall structure such asWood Wallfor snapping. Hold 'R' while placing the Wood Halfpieces itself to determine shape as well as placement as roof, or wall.

items.name: Wood Halfpitches
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood roofs or walls require a floor or wall structure such asWood Wallfor snapping. Hold 'R' while placing the Wood Halfpitches itself to determine shape as well as placement as roof, or wall.

items.name: Wood Javelin
items.description: The Wood Javelin is a variant of theWood Spearthat can only be thrown. The Wood Javelin has the slowest projectile travel time and highest projectile fall-off, but that can be overlooked by it's cheap producibility.

items.name: Wood Ladder
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood Ladders can be use with Trapdoor holes (hold R while holding a floor building piece and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel). Does not snap to trapdoor holes.

items.name: Wood Pile
items.description: The Wood Pile, alongside theStone Pile, are makeshift storage options for large quantities of each raw material. Though immune to mostWeatherdamage, beware of lightning strikes. Can be used as a durable barrier toFauna, especially against Fauna like theGrizzly Bear, although the stone variant is preferred.

items.name: Wood Piranha Statue
items.description: The Wood Piranha Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Rabbit Statue
items.description: The Wood Rabbit Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Railing
items.description: The Wood Railing is part of theWood Building Trim Set, which is learned in theTier 1Tech Tree after unlocking theWood Building Base Set.

items.name: Wood Railing Gate
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offers good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood Railing Gates can be deployed on their own or can be snapped to railings/floors.

items.name: Wood Shield
items.description: The Wood Shield is crafted at the Anvil, Forge, or Foundry with the following resources:

items.name: Wood Spikes Fortification
items.description: The Wood Spikes Fortification serves as large hedgehog that can attachWood Wall Fortificationsto fend off the predators of Icarus. Similar toMedium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Spikes Fortification does not take damage during storms.

items.name: Wood Walkway Fortification
items.description: The Wood Walkway Fortification is attached toWood Wall Fortificationsand serves as a platform that Prospectors can stand on, providing them a vantage point to see over their walls. Similar toMedium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Walkway Fortification does not take damage during storms.

items.name: Wooden Lure
items.description: The Wooden Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like allLures, the Wooden Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Wooden Shovel
items.description: The Wooden Shovel is an early-gameToolused to createDirt Mounds(right-click), harvestIce/Dirt/Sand(left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in theArctic/Volcanicbiomes on Icarus.

items.name: Wool
items.description: Wool from sheep can be used to craft arctic pelt, platinum weave or rope.

items.name: Yeast
items.description: A small flower which grows in groups in theForestBiomeon Icarus. They can be harvested most efficiently with the use ofSickles.

items.name: Young Coconut
items.description: Harvested from palm trees in theDesert, when chopping their tops with an axe. If a prospector lets it decay, it will ripen into aRipe Coconut.
harvested_from: when chopping their tops with an axe
